subject: College Athletics
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Jerry Tarkanian, a former coach of Nevada-Las Vegas, said he thought the N.C.A.A. was “the crookedest organization in our society,” drawing several laughs during a luncheon at the Downtown Tip-Off Club in North Little Rock, Ark.
